mapper.insert: insert into item(seller_member_id, `name`, category, price, `count`, contents, option_num, `file`, delivery_charge) values(#{item.seller_member_id}, #{item.name}, #{item.category}, #{item.price}, #{item.count}, #{item.contents}, #{item.option_num}, #{item.file}, #{item.delivery_charge})
